data.name: gfastats
data.description: A single fast and exhaustive tool for summary statistics and simultaneous *fa* (fasta, fastq, gfa [.gz]) genome assembly file manipulation.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Either download one of the releases or `git clone https://github.com/vgl-hub/gfastats.git --recursive` and `make -j` in `gfastats` folder."

"The swiss army knife for genome assembly." and "gfastats is a single fast and exhaustive tool for summary statistics and simultaneous *fa* ... genome assembly file manipulation." (end-user tool for genome assembly work)

"Please refer to gfastats paper for a complete description. Briefly, gfastats reads and stores any fasta<>fastq<>gfa[.gz] in gfa format... Finally, walking the graph allows to generate different kinds of outputs, including manipulated assemblies and feature coordinates." (directly used to generate research-relevant genome assembly outputs)
